text: @MarshallCohen I wouldn’t wish the coronavirus on anyone other than Rush.  Oh, and Stephen Miller and the rest of the Cult if Trump and all the Bernie Bros.  Fuck it, maybe I’ll follow the lead of anti-vaxxers and travel to China.
